attributes.action: Don’t penalise disabled people for their disabilities or unable to work
attributes.additional_details: Disabled people deserve better treatment than those who can work. Disabled people don’t deserve to be penalised for their disabilities because they don’t have a choice to be disabled. Financially they need more than vouchers because vouchers don’t pay their bills or medication
attributes.background: Help disabled people more financially and more effectively than those who are able to work and don’t want to work

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Protect Disabled people who cannot work from planned cuts to benefits
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721547

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918
